descriptionHtml:
Slaughterfishes don\'t attack you anymore. So they won\'t prevent you from fasttraveling or waiting.

Place the [i]MZ Peaceful Slaughterfish.esp[/i] in your ..\\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder and make sure it is activated.

To uninstall simply remove the ESP-file.

No bugs known.

May be merged in any other plugin. Credits not necessary to be given but welcome.


Note: This was made with the German version. I don\' know if and how the multilinguality of Skyrim works.


Have fun
MorpheuZ/Sronthgorrth
author: MorpheuZ
